name: SleepySounds
0:
”Alexa, open Sleepy Sounds”
”Alexa, start Sleepy Sounds”
”Alexa, launch Sleepy Sounds”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleepy sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Sounds: Sleepy Sounds offers beautiful themed sleep sounds & music to help you fall fast asleep in the most relaxed way possible. Get a great night sleep, feel empowered, energised and centred.

This is the official Sleepy Sounds skill, crafted by VoiceXpert.

Instructions:

To launch Sleepy Sounds, say “Alexa, open Sleepy Sounds.”

To hear a list of sleep sounds, say “Alexa, ask Sleepy Sounds for a list.” Arna will read aloud each sound using her beautiful relaxing voice.

To play a specific sleep sound, say “Alexa, ask Sleepy Sounds to play [Gentle Forest Rain].”

There are currently 26 sleep sounds for your sleeping pleasure. Each sound will automatically play for 10 hours (premium version) automatically, looping is not required.

At the end of each sleep sound, for the last hour there is a gorgeous meditation to help you gently awake (premium version).

Brand new sleep sounds are created and added all the time for your enjoyment. Sleepy Sounds will send you a notification once they are active via Alexa.


List of Sleep Sounds:


1. Gentle Forest Rain 
2. Camp Fire 
3. Caribbean Sea
4. Windy Leaves
5. Thunder & Lighting
6. Arctic Winds
7. Rain Forest
8. Night Car Journey 
9. Howling Winds 
10. Forest Stream 
11. Exotic Jungle 
12. City at Night 
13. Autumn Forest 
14. Winter Forest 
15. Summer Forest 
16. Forest Rain & Thunder 
17. The Deep 
18. Under the Stars 
19. Spacecraft 
20. Ticking Clock 
21. Wind Chimes 
22. Washing Machine 
23. Winds of Mars 
24. Enchanted Forest
25. The Cave
26. Pirate Ship 

Premium Membership:


-> 10 hrs of sleepy sounds as opposed 5 hours with the free version.

-> Get instant access to 100% increase in audio quality (320Kbps).
 
-> Enhanced looping with no annoying hourly sound gaps.

-> Gorgeous meditation to help you gently awake at the end of each sound theme.

-> Plus, new sleep sounds continually added.

Help Us, Help You:

The VoiceXpert team have literally spent hours carefully crafting this Alexa skill. We have a passion for helping people. 

We would really love a review to help us improve Sleepy Sounds and other future skills we develop.
